name: Baldi's Basics Classic Archives
description:
These are game files of previous Baldi's Basics Classic, these got taken down off of the itch.io page due to them being buggy or just not stable enough to be fair.

The platforms you can play on are ONLY Windows and Mac.

Unfortunately there is no Mac version for 1.3.1 that I could find as of now.

Links

Basically Games: https://basically-games.itch.io

Other

(I DO NOT OWN THIS GAME, I AM JUST RE-UPLOADING IT SO PEOPLE CAN PLAY THIS AGAIN, ALL CREDIT GOES TO MYSTMAN12 FOR CREATING THE GAME)
